an6.78:1.1: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has six things they’re full of joy and happiness in the present life, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.
an6.78:1.3: It’s when a mendicant enjoys the teaching, meditation, giving up, seclusion, kindness, and non-proliferation.
an6.78:1.4: When a mendicant has these six things they’re full of joy and happiness in the present life, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.”
